mItemDataClient.mDescription:
%i:scaleSV% @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp against jungle monsters
  • Sear: Damaging jungle monsters burns them for @TotalBurnDamage@ magic damage over @Effect3Amount@ seconds.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item and upgrades your Smite to Challenging Smite, increasing its damage to monsters to @TooltipUpgradedSmiteValue@ and damage to minions to @TooltipMinionDamageFlat@ +@TooltipMinionDamagePercentHealth*100@% target max Health. Challenging Smite marks champions for @ImmolatingMarkDuration@ seconds. Damaging a marked champion deals an additional @ImmolatingBurnDamageTooltip@ true damage to them over @ImmolatingBurnDuration@ seconds. You take @ImmolatingReductionPercent*100@% reduced damage from marked champions.
  • Huntsman: Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to @ManaRestoreForTooltip@ Mana (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

    {{ Item_Jungle_Rules }}
    Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

mItemDataClient.mDescription:
Requires Summoner Spell Smite
Jungle Companions
Summon a Scorchclaw that assists you against monsters.

Scorchclaw's Slash
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies and Slow them. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.

mLocKeys.keyTooltip:
Jungle Companions
Summon a Scorchclaw that assists you against monsters.

Scorchclaw's Slash
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies and Slow them. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.
mLocKeys.keyTooltipExtended:
Jungle Companions
Summon a Scorchclaw that deals @spell.SummonerSmite:PetDPS@ damage and heals you for @spell.SummonerSmite:PetHPS@ per second against monsters.

Scorchclaw's Slash
The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your Smite. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies for @AvatarMaxHPBurnTotal*100@% max health true damage over @AvatarBurnDuration@ seconds and Slow them by @AvatarSlowAmount*100@%, decaying over @AvatarSlowDuration@ seconds. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.
  • The companion can be fed up to @TotalCounters@ Treats. When you kill a large monster you feed it once, twice if you have bonus treats. You periodically get bonus treats to feed to your companion which also grant bonus gold.
  • @Breakpoint1@ Treats: Your Smite deals @spell.SummonerSmite:SmiteUpgradedDamage@ damage. It can be cast on enemy champions to deal reduced damage and Slow them.
  • @TotalCounters@ Treats: Your Smite deals @spell.SummonerSmite:Smite2ndUpgradedDamage@ damage to nearby monsters.

    Companion damage is capped at @spell.SummonerSmite:EpicDamageCap@ against Epic monsters.
    Gain an additional @spell.PuppyControllerBuff:TreatXP@ experience per large monster killed and @spell.PuppyControllerBuff:FirstMonsterBonusXP@ additional experience from the first.
mLocKeys.keyTooltipExternal: <li><passive>Jungle Companions:</passive> Summon an <font color='#DD2E2E'>Scorchclaw</font> to assist you in the jungle.<li><passive>Scorchclaw's Slash:</passive> When fully grown your companion periodically imbues your next damaging effect to <status>Slow</status> and <passive>damage</passive> enemy champions.

mItemDataClient.mDescription: <stats>Vanguard</stats>
mItemDataClient.mDynamicTooltip:
Vanguard UNIQUE Passive - Tower Vanguard: Has a @Effect1Amount@ health champion damage shield. This shield regenerates to full @Effect2Amount@ seconds after not taking damage.

UNIQUE Passive - Champion Vanguard: While this tower has the tower vanguard shield, grants nearby champions a @Effect3Amount@ health per second regenerating shield (Max @Effect4Amount@ health). This shield decays while away from a shielded tower. The shield does not regenerate on champions actively taking damage.

OverchargedAt @StartTime@ minutes: begins to malfunction, losing Armor and Magic Resistance.
At @DamageTime@ minutes: begins to break down, losing health every @DamageInterval@ seconds.

They're a little stinky, but effective.
